QueryList.Query: FROM Dictionary A WHERE 1=1 <#if value??> <#if like??> and A.value like '%'||:value||'%' <#else> and A.value=:value </#if> </#if> <#if key??> <#if like??> and A.key like '%'||:key||'%' <#else> and A.key=:key </#if> </#if> <#if parent??> <#if like??> and A.parent like '%'||:parent||'%' <#else> and A.parent=:parent </#if> </#if> <#if attachment2??> <#if like??> and A.attachment2 like '%'||:attachment2||'%' <#else> and A.attachment2=:attachment2 </#if> </#if> <#if attachment??> <#if like??> and A.attachment like '%'||:attachment||'%' <#else> and A.attachment=:attachment </#if> </#if> <#if status??> <#if like??> and A.status like '%'||:status||'%' <#else> and A.status=:status </#if> </#if> <#if remark??> <#if like??> and A.remark like '%'||:remark||'%' <#else> and A.remark=:remark </#if> </#if>
